entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
